finalizeArena(uint256).details: Takes rake, splits fees, tracks god streaks, mints highlight NFT.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

addArenaToTournament(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Add an arena to a tournament round

commitPrediction(uint256,bytes32).notice: Commit hashed prediction during the arena.

createArena(uint8,uint40).notice: Create a new arena with a specific tier

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdraw if arena is stuck (not finalized after EMERGENCY_BLOCK_DELAY blocks past end)

finalizeArena(uint256).notice: Finalize arena: score players, distribute pot to top scorer(s).

finalizeTournament(uint256).notice: Finalize tournament  award pot to winner (must be last round, single qualified player)

getEntryFee(uint8).notice: Get entry fee for a tier

getRakeBps(uint8).notice: Get rake basis points for a tier

joinArena(uint256).notice: Join an arena before it starts, paying the entry fee.

setHighlightsNFT(address).notice: Set the Highlights NFT contract address

submitPriceTape(uint256,bytes).notice: Owner submits the actual price tape after arena ends.
